page.title: 01CLEADON,BOLDON AND WHITELEAS
page.content: The area is a pleasant mixture of housing and farmland.Land cover is 50% residential,50% farm use which because of its distribution gives a rural flavour to the scene generally. The main residential areas are: {a)Whiteleas and Cleadon Park}which are large council estates,made up of terraced and semi-detached houses, bungalows,maisonettes and a small number of flats. {b)Cleadon and East Boldon}which are areas of private housing.Although these houses are mainly semi-detached or terraced,there are many examples of individually-styled detached buildings. The green belt between this area and Sunderland is in danger of being eaten away by new building programmes. . The farming area includes a dairy farm,some mixed farming,and piggeries.
